[CBM] Black Lagoon - Roberta's Blood Trail (Dual Audio) [BDRip-720p-8bit]

* Based on the manga by Hiroe Rei.

The assassination of the head of the Lovelace family in Venezuela sets his maid,
a former terrorist named Roberta, on a bloodthirsty quest for revenge at any cost.
The search for the culprits leads her to Roanapur, causing a massive commotion in
Thailand. Garcia, heir of the Lovelace legacy and someone who regards Roberta as a
precious family member, also travels to Roanapur and wants to make a deal with the Lagoon Company.
